title: 03/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/08/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises Steph Curry after winning another 3 point shooting contest and his performance in the All Star Game and why we need to give him the credit he deserves. He thinks the Patriots must be in a bad place if their best plan to address the quarterback position is trying to trade for Jimmy Garoppolo. He talks to former NFL head coach Eric Mangini about Odell Beckham Jr and Tom Brady potentially teaming up in Tampa Bay and if Jalen Hurts is the new franchise quarterback in Philadelphia.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
